Title: SPL: Kill Zone
Writer: Wilson Yip, Kam-Yuen Szeto, Wai Lun Ng
Actors: Donnie Yen, Simon Yam, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Jing Wu
Plot: A near retired inspector and his unit are willing to put down a crime boss at all costs while dealing with his replacement, who is getting in their way. Meanwhile, the crime boss sends his top henchmen to put an end to their dirty schemes.
